summary: The diff summary shows documentation and project metadata updates describing background image/audio paths and an added “Enter the Website” screen, but it does not show the required static asset file replacements in frontend/public/assets/generated/ for the three backgrounds or the background music.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the app’s three page background assets by copying/renaming the user-uploaded images into the expected static asset filenames under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (bg-page-1.dim_1920x1080.png, bg-page-2.dim_1920x1080.png, bg-page-3.dim_1920x1080.png) so Page 1–3 show the new images with existing contain/letterbox + overlay behavior unchanged.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary lists no changes/additions to any files under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and no binary/static asset updates; only documentation/project metadata mention the mapping.

missing_requirements.requirement: Install the user-uploaded audio file as background music at frontend/public/assets/generated/background-music.mp3 (exact filename), preserving existing hidden autoplay attempt + interaction fallback, looping, and persistence across navigation.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary provides no evidence that frontend/public/assets/generated/background-music.mp3 was added/replaced; only documentation references a ‘current source’ MP3.

hallucinated_features.description: Adding a Valentine-themed “Enter the Website” intro screen/flow before Page 1.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists adding an “Enter the Website” screen as a non-goal unless re-confirmed, but the diff summary states it was included.
